import MKBox from"components/MKBox";import MKButton from"components/MKButton";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DropdownAndDropup(){const[dropdown,setDropdown]=useState(null);const[dropup,setDropup]=useState(null);const openDropdown=_ref=>{let{currentTarget}=_ref;return setDropdown(currentTarget);};const closeDropdown=()=>setDropdown(null);const openDropup=_ref2=>{let{currentTarget}=_ref2;return setDropup(currentTarget);};const closeDropup=()=>setDropup(null);// Styles
const iconStyles={ml:1,fontWeight:"bold",transition:"transform 200ms ease-in-out"};const dropdownIconStyles={transform:dropdown?"rotate(180deg)":"rotate(0)",...iconStyles};const dropupIconStyles={transform:dropup?"rotate(180deg)":"rotate(0)",...iconStyles};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBox,{component:"section",py:12,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,lg:6,textAlign:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKButton,{variant:"gradient",color:"info",onClick:openDropdown,children:["Dropdown ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{sx:dropdownIconStyles,children:"expand_more"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Menu,{anchorEl:dropdown,open:Boolean(dropdown),onClose:closeDropdown,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropdown,children:"Action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropdown,children:"Another action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropdown,children:"Something else here"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,lg:6,textAlign:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKButton,{variant:"gradient",color:"info",onClick:openDropup,children:["Dropup ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{sx:dropupIconStyles,children:"expand_more"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Menu,{anchorEl:dropup,open:Boolean(dropup),anchorOrigin:{vertical:"top",horizontal:"left"},transformOrigin:{vertical:"bottom",horizontal:"left"},onClose:closeDropup,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropup,children:"Action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropup,children:"Another action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:closeDropup,children:"Something else here"})]})]})]})})});}export default DropdownAndDropup;
